attributes.action: stop pandering to Immigrants and Muslims and give England back to the English
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop forced Muslim teachings in English schools. To no longer favour any individual in this country over another. To stop seperatist ideas waved under the banner of "integration" and "multiculturalism". To ensure that every individual is treated exactly the same as one another

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
